name: The calm before the swarm
description:
This is a representation of the migration of bees, seen from a perspective of geometric bodies. Nowadays we know that bees are essential for the life in our planet, which is part of the reflection to transmit through this image. 
If you have ever seen the migration of bees, it is also scary since they move rapidly and make noise. As humans we get scared of things that move fast, but this image intends to capture that moment of calm. Finally, while everything changes, we have to find a way to continue improving ;).
